content: > **please note ** this pattern is free to > view in its entirety on my blog this > ad-free downloadable pdf enables me to > be able to bring you more free > patterns in the future such a simple and very fun pattern this coaster which you could also use for an applique can be customized as you would like leaving ample room for variety and creativity make a pack and give them as gifts or make different colors and keep them in your house before you know it you ll have so many you won t know what to do with them you may sell all finished products made from this pattern however you may not share sell or distribute this pattern in any way in whole or in part i would greatly appreciate a link back to my shop or this pattern anytime you sell this item online you may not use any of the photos from this listing or the ones contained in the pattern to sell your item you must take your own photos copyright @ divine debris 2012 - 2017 no part of this document may be reproduced or transmitted in any form by any means electronic mechanical photocopying or otherwise without prior written permission from the author sales of finished product are permitted but designer requests that you link back to pattern and credit divine debris with the original design under the creative commons attribution-share alike license if you have any questions comments or concerns please contact info@divinedebris com
